name: Oliver Schilke
bioHTML: Oliver Schilke's practice investigates the entanglement and interconnection between all forms of life through immersive experiences. Using physical interaction with spatial sound design, Oliver explores our acoustic soundscapes in relation to ecological environments. He highlights the importance of understanding our place within the world and its sonic domain. Originally focusing on social and political awareness though art direction and graphic design, Oliver began to call attention to these topics using technology while encompassing environmental concern into his narratives.

events.title: Artist Q&A - Multispecies Rehearsal
events.desc: An opportunity to watch demonstrations of our artist's work alongside in-depth insight into their process. There is also the chance to connect with them through live Q&A and conversation surrounding the theme 'Multispecies Rehearsal'.
